a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMeningococcalQuadrivalentConjugateVaccines2DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines 2 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D), 2-dose schedule * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMeningococcalQuadrivalentConjugateVaccines2DosesLogic

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 9 months

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "One meningococcal primary series dose was administered"
"Client's age was less than or equal to 23 months when the primary series was started"
"The latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 months ago"

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client\'s age is less than 9 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client's age is less than 9 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "No meningococcal primary series dose was administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 9 months"

def.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as client\'s age was less than 23 months when the primary series was started and the latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 3 months ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as client's age was less than 23 months when the primary series was started and the latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 3 months ago. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

"Client's age was more than 23 months when the primary series was started"

def.name: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:s.a:s: 'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete as client\'s age was more than 23 months when primary series was started. One primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

when.name: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Case 1

then.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 23 months when primary series was started. One primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

when.name: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Case 2

then.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

operand.name: Guidance
Guidance

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client\'s age is less than 9 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as client\'s age was less than 23 months when the primary series was started and the latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 3 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete as client\'s age was more than 23 months when primary series was started. One primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
